attributes.action: Get Florists , Garden Centres & anywhere that sells Lillies & Bouquets including Lillies to put a warning on that they are highly poisonous & deadly to cats .
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As a cat lover & owner  , I have been aware of the dangers of Lillies to cats for some time & would never have lillies in my garden or home . However my cats & others roam in quite a few  gardens in the neighbourhood & I believe there to be many cat lovers or owners who are completely unaware of these dangers .
Sadly one of my friends cats had to be PTS due to Lilly poisoning earlier this week & his suffering was agonising ! despite vets treatment . & she was fully aware of the dangers & making neighbours aware . Absolutely tragic !!!!

I am petitioning to make it compulsory for all Garden centres , Florists or any other retailer of Lillies & other plants dangerous to cats or other animals , whether in bouquets , fully grown plants or bulbs to put or give a warning as to the danger of these popular plants to cats . & what with Christmas coming up , might I also point out that Poinsettas are also extremely poisonous !

Please sign my petition to prevent the loss of more beloved cats to this horrifying death !

Thank you for reading .
